attributes.action: give asthmatics and heart patients free prescriptions whatever their income as they do in scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: asthmatics and heart patients (warfarin takers)need these drugs to live..it seems unfair that if you are above the line for free prescriptions ie you work and do not claim benefits or on incapacity benefit and live with a spouse who works that you have to pay for prescriptions to keep you alive. if you live in scotland these and other prescriptions are free, shouldn't it be free to all in the united kingdom, not just a selct few?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
